逐元素对操作数的各元素运用给定的二元运算符。返回一个 {{ltt|cpp/experimental/simd/simd}}，{{simd_for_all_i}}，第 {{math|i}} 个元素等于：
@1@ {{c|lhs[i] + rhs[i]}}
@2@ {{c|lhs[i] - rhs[i]}}
@3@ {{c|lhs[i] * rhs[i]}}
@4@ {{c|lhs[i] / rhs[i]}}
@5@ {{c|lhs[i] % rhs[i]}}
@6@ {{c|lhs[i] &amp; rhs[i]}}
@7@ {{c|lhs[i] {{!}} rhs[i]}}
@8@ {{c|lhs[i] ^ rhs[i]}}
@9@ {{c|lhs[i] &lt;&lt; rhs[i]}}
@10@ {{c|lhs[i] &lt;&lt; n}}
@11@ {{c|lhs[i] &gt;&gt; rhs[i]}}
@12@ {{c|lhs[i] &gt;&gt; n}}

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs|左操作数}}
{{par|rhs|右操作数}}
{{par|n|{{c|lhs}} 中每个元素要位移的位数}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
如上所述的 {{ltt|cpp/experimental/simd/simd}}。
